name: Tính từ liên quan đến thể thao (Adjectives Related to Sports)

words.example: She has a very competitive spirit when playing sports.

words.vietnamese: Thuộc về thể thao, khỏe mạnh
words.example: He is very athletic and excels in many different sports.
It's important for athletes to stay fit to perform well.
Weightlifters need to be very strong to lift heavy weights.
Sprinters are known for being incredibly fast runners.
A skilled basketball player can dribble and shoot with precision.
